quotes.quote: Arizona is a great place to be a radiation researcher.
Arizona's vale of mountain-temples.
Arizona is now recognized as a premier place in which to locate, expand and grow a business.
Arizona is gorgeous. The sunshine in Arizona is gorgeous red.
You know you're from Arizona when you feed your chickens ice cubes to keep them from laying hard-boiled eggs.
You know you're from Arizona when you drive two miles around a parking lot looking for a shady place - even in the dead of winter.
Arizona faces unique healthcare challenges including uncompensated care for illegal immigrants, and the large number of Native Americans who live in remote and isolated areas of the state.
Arizona may be the only state in America where mothers don't tell their children that someday they can grow up and be president.
Then the wind blew cool through the pinyons on the rim. There was a sweet tang of cedar and sage on the air and that indefinable fragrance peculiar to the canyon country of Arizona.
Welcome to Arizona, where summer spends the winter â€” and hell spends the summer
In the empire of desert, water is the king and shadow is the queen.
Nowhere on this planet is the desert as fascinating as it is in Arizona.
You know you live in Phoenix when the cold-water faucet is hotter than the hot-water faucet.
Arizona, our beautiful state, was built on mining.
You know you're an Arizona native when you hug a cactus only once in your lifetime.
You know you're an Arizona native, when a rainy day puts you in a good mood.
Arizona seeks only to enforce the nominal immigration policy of the United States. Perhaps the federal government should try it sometime.
You know you're an Arizona native, when in your heart you're sure that at the end of the rainbow there is not a pot of goldâ€”but a good Mexican restaurant.
Today, Arizona's sons and daughters, mothers and fathers are proudly serving their country.
Arizona presents no specific reason for excepting capital defendants from the constitutional protections extended to defendants generally, and none is readily apparent.
In Arizona, shade trees are your best friends â€” and occasionally the basis of small civil wars over parking.
Almost everyone in the world knows something about Arizona, and some of it is even true.
In Arizona we salt margaritas, not sidewalks.
If there's one thing Arizona is best in the nation at, it's water.
Arizona now has one of the most innovative systems of financing school construction in the nation.
You know you're an Arizona native when you take rain dances seriously.
By working together, we can make Arizona a place where everyone has an opportunity for a better life.
The Arizona desert takes hold of a man's mind and shakes it.
The United States and Arizona are both losing jobs to offshore locations.
Arizona... a land where a good spring is far better than a gold mine.
The Grand Canyon is carven deep by the master hand; it is the Gulf of silence, widened in the desert, it is all time inscribing the naked rock; it is the book of earth.
Land of extremes. Land of contrasts. Land of surprises. Land of contradictions.
Across the Colorado River from the Needles, the dark and jagged ramparts of Arizona stood up against the sky, and behind them the huge tilted plain rising toward the backbone of the continent again.

As you know, Arizona recently passed the toughest anti-immigration bill in American history. The idea behind this bill is to drive illegal immigrants out of Arizona and back to their homeland in Los Angeles.
The popular conception of Arizona is of an infertile desert country, yet the flora ranges from the subtropical to the sub-alpine.
Arizona may be the youngest of the nation's contiguous states, but it is an ancient land that has been inhabited for millenniums.
Arizona is called the land of sunshine because it is one of the driest states in the United States.
Arizona is also the biggest copper producer in the United States. This is how it got its nickname, the Copper State.
Arizona is known for five 'Cs'-copper, citrus, cotton, cattle, and climate.
Although Arizona is still a young state, its varied cultural traditions have created a rich and colorful history.
Driving through the backcountry of Arizona, you will notice countless natural wonders and traces of the past.
Arizona is a magnificent state. With something for everyone. I realize that no poem, song, picture, or words could ever do justice to Arizona.
Today, for most people, Arizona is a property, the land is ownership and market value.
You're not going to believe this, but, there are things you can collect in Arizona that are neither illegal, poisonous, or taxable. Fossils are one such item. Please don't tell the legislature.
Arizona has long reflected the traditionalistic values of the southerners who settled the territory and who have continued to migrate to the state over the years.
Arizona is practically synonymous with desert.
Arizona is the only state where you can hike into one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World.
In Arizona, you can hike among cactus as tall as office buildings.
I ain't movin' to Arizona! Dammit, there is nothing' there but gravel and scorpions.
Things in Arizona don't just die; they bake and fry in the heat until there is nothing left.
Even the plants in Arizona wanted to hurt you.
Out of labor's struggle in Arizona came better conditions for the worker, who must everywhere, at all times, under advantage and disadvantage work out their own salvation.
I hate Arizona. It's always eight hundred degrees outside and everybody's always saying, ‘But it's a dry heat!’ So's the inside of my microwave.'
I live in Arizona. I think the Hispanic people are amazing. I think when people talk about illegal immigration…It does them a disservice.
Somebody said I am the most popular person in Arizona because I am speaking the truth.
Arizona, with its wide-open spaces and no one peering over your shoulder, had always been a haven for folks who didn't like the law or other busybodies to know what they were up to.
Arizona is a red state, and we're going to keep it red.
If you want to live in a state known for its corruption, come to Arizona!
